name: [breaking change] v0.6.0
body:
* Update to scio 0.8 and other dependencies that required version update #212

With this release, we will stop supporting Scio version below 0.8.0. This is due to a breaking change introduced by Scio 0.8.0. For details, please refer to https://spotify.github.io/scio/migrations/v0.8.0-Migration-Guide.html#sciocontext

name: v0.5.0
body:
* use java serialization #178 

This is a minor version bump with potentially breaking change. Kryo is no longer used for serialisation so implementing `java.io.Serializable` will be required.

name: v0.4.2
body:

name: v0.4.1
body:
Nothing to say...

The same as `0.4.0`.

name: v0.4.0
body:
* rename context to output #166

  This is a breaking change.

  The `context` method and `TaskContextStrict` is typically used to define outputs that are produced when a task is evaluated. Thus `output` and `TaskOutput` are more fitting names.

* scio: remove `ScioContext` from `result()` #159

  This is a breaking change.

  If the scio job is asynchronously executed by some alternative flo runtime, the `ScioContext` instance used to submit the job might not exist any more when the job completes.

name: v0.2.1
body:
- a new `OverridingContext` that will make it easier to have Tasks that can be skipped if the value is already available without running the process function (#58)
- fix a bug that would eat the last few log outputs when calling `waitAndExit()` (#59)

name: v0.2.0
body:
- `FloRunner.runTask` now returns a `Result<T>` object that can be waited on or `System.exit()` with an appropriate status code (#53)
- ~~`in`~~ and ~~`ins`~~ now replaced with `input` and `inputs` (#54)

- #17 Generated implementation, now goes up to 26 arguments
- Renamed `io.rouz.task` to `io.rouz.flo`
- More robust error propagation handling in Task evaluation

[commits](https://github.com/rouzwawi/flo/compare/v0.0.5...v0.0.6)

- #16 Add currentTaskId method to TaskContext
- #5 First iteration of Scala API
- Removed `OptionParser parser()` from `TaskConstructor` interface

[commits](https://github.com/rouzwawi/flo/compare/v0.0.4...v0.0.5)

- #9 - Logo
- #11 - `Task...ofType(Class)`
- #12, #13 - `Value<T>` failure handling

[commits](https://github.com/rouzwawi/flo/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4)
http://rouz.io/flo/maven/0.0.4

- #2 - Promises for TaskContext
- #3 - Async Task Processing
- #6 - Create TaskId early in TaskBuilder api
- #7 - Rename `.constant(F0<T>)` -> `.process(F0<T>)`
- #8 - Interception mechanism for process fn evaluation
- Removed `task.out()`

[commits](https://github.com/rouzwawi/flo/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3)
http://rouz.io/flo/maven/0.0.3

- Moved evaluation control to `TaskContext` and clarified API for external implementation
- Implement async evaluation through `TaskContext.async(ExecutorService)` / `AsyncContext`
- `TaskId` parsing from strings

http://rouz.io/flo/maven/0.0.2
